cause.description:
I (we) belive that the government is a bunch of currupt polotians that don't have a proper attitude to be running the government and that we need to make sure the next generation of government officals now how to care for the government and its citizens.
1. Our conserns are for the citzens
2. We care for the poor before the rich
3. The laws should be unwavering
cause.mission: to make the government the way it should be
cause.name: Collaboration of Future America
